definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: Everything you say adds up to justice.
sentences.chinese: 你所說的一切，總合起來就是正義。

sentences.english: Top of the Scrap Heap-Reach a combined class level of 100 in Multiplayer.
sentences.chinese: 在多人模式中，所有職業的等級總合達到100。

sentences.english: The Kup's Half Full -Reach a combined class level of 50 in Multiplayer.
sentences.chinese: 在多人模式中，所有職業的等級總合達到50。

sentences.english: The tactile sensitivity of forearm to summate the length of plexiglass rectangles was tested.
sentences.chinese: 本文報道被動觸覺的長度總合實驗。

sentences.english: This project is the general building for Egyptian business department, including one underground floor and five overground floors.
sentences.chinese: 本工程爲埃及經商處總合樓，地下一層，地上五層。

sentences.english: Life is the cumulative sum of your decisions.
sentences.chinese: 人生就是你一系列決議的總合。

definition: sum (result of addition)/addition/total/to add up a number of items/to accumulate
sum or volume of business transactions/turnover
(of a sum of money etc) receivable
to add up the total/to figure what sth amounts to/to consider
remittance/funds paid to a bank account
